raw_text: GOONEWARDENE – MRS VICTORINE (Nee De ALMEIDA) passed away peacefully in London,​ UK,​ on 27th April 2022,​ aged 86. Beloved wife of Nihal (Consulting Engineer),​ loving mother of Dr Tyronne Goonewardene,​ Rozanne Ghai and Natasha Jafferjee,​ mother-in-law of Vinay Ghai and Mufaddal Jafferjee,​ devoted grandmother to Arun,​ Saurav (deceased),​ Isvari,​ Karishva,​ Rayyan and Armaan,​ daughter of Laurie and Gladys De Almeida,​ sister of Linus,​ Merril,​ Angela,​ Didacus and Rexie (all deceased). The Interment of Ashes will be take place on Saturday 12th August 2023 at 4.30 p.m. at Madampitiya Cemetery.048041

PANAMBALANA LEONARD – (Retired Secretary – Ministry of Health). Cherished and treasured husband of Quinzie,​ precious Thaththa & Appachchi of Malkanthi & Lal,​ Chandi & Primal,​ Dushi & Manilal and adored Aththa & Thaththa of Cisholi,​ Chehani,​ Ashanya,​ Janek,​ Maneka,​ Dineeka,​ Mithraka & Dhruvik,​ beloved son of the late Sylvester & Josephine Panamlabalana,​ loved brother of late Harry,​ late Kingsley,​ Pauline,​ Alan & late Christo,​ loved uncle of Robert & Mohan,​ passedaway peacefully. Remains lie at 51,​ Asoka Circle,​ Subuthipura,​ Battaramulla from 4.00 p.m. Friday,​ 4th August 2023. Cortege leaves at 3.45 p.m. on Saturday,​ 5 August 2023 for Cremation at the General Cemetery Kanatte (New Crematorium) at 4.30 p.m.048116

PERERA – GAYATRI,​ Beloved wife of late Rohan,​ loving mother of Anika,​ precious daughter of late Charles and Eugenie Ameresekere,​ much loved sister of Harsha and Revata,​ sister-in-law of Vasantha and Niranthi,​ Anura and Upeksha and Lumindra and Chandima,​ passed away peacefully on 4th August 2023. Remains lie at residence,​ No. 7/​5,​ Alubogahawatte Road (off Anderson Road),​ Nedimala,​ Dehiwala. Cortege leaves residence at 4.15 p.m. on 5th August for Burial at 5.00 p.m. at St. Thomas’ Church Burial Grounds,​ Kotte.048797

SHAKTHEVELL – T. (Ex HNB). It is with heavy hearts & profound sadness that we announce the passing away of T. SHAKTHEVELL (Ex HNB). Beloved husband of Manjula,​ loving father of Vaenthaan (UK),​ son of late Thambiayah & Rasaloginy,​ son-in-law of late S. Arulanantham,​ Paremeswary Arulanantham,​ loving brother of Sakthiyabama,​ Gnanamalar,​ Gnanavel. Funeral Sunday the 6th August at General Cemetery,​ Negombo. Cortege leaves residence,​ No. 68,​ Main Street,​ Negombo (Opposite General Post Office).048163
